item.title: Produce xor Edit
item.description: When you write, either produce content or modify what’s been written. Implementation Produce as early as possible: Start with bullet-points. List all things in your mind. Turn some of those into sentences. Fuse some of those sentences into paragraphs. Repeat, until you feel overwhelmed. Then go to (2). Start editing: Bold texts that you find important. Delete texts that you find unnecessary. Move texts to sort out logic.
